'Sodium myreth sulfate' is a mixture of organic compounds with both detergent
and surfactant properties. It is found in many personal care products such as
soaps, shampoos, and toothpaste. It is an inexpensive and effective foaming
agent. Typical of many detergents, sodium myreth sulfate consists of several
closely related compounds. Sometimes the number of ethylene glycol ether units
(n) is specified in the name as myreth-n sulfate, for example myreth-2 sulfate.
